hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EOTI_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, REC_VER, REC_STATUS, COMPANY_CODE, SITE_CODE, PM_CODE, EOTI_ORDER_NO, EOTI_WORK_ORDER_NO, EOTI_DOWNSTREAM_NO, EOTI_LOGISTIC_NO, EOTI_EXPRESS_NO, EOTI_CARRIERS_CODE, EOTI_CARRIERS_NAME, EOTI_TRACKING_TIME, EOTI_TRACKING_SITE, EOTI_SIGN_PEOPLE, EOTI_STATUS, EOTI_STATUS_REMARK FROM EO_TRACKING_INFO WHERE 1=1 <<AND EOTI_ID LIKE :eotiId>> <<AND CREATOR LIKE :creator>> <<AND CREATE_TIME > :createTimeFrom>> <<AND CREATE_TIME <= :createTimeTo + 1>> <<AND MODIFIER LIKE :modifier>> <<AND MODIFY_TIME > :modifyTimeFrom>> <<AND MODIFY_TIME <= :modifyTimeTo + 1>> <<AND REC_VER LIKE :recVer>> <<AND REC_STATUS LIKE :recStatus>> <<AND COMPANY_CODE LIKE :companyCode>> <<AND SITE_CODE LIKE :siteCode>> <<AND PM_CODE LIKE :pmCode>> <<AND EOTI_ORDER_NO LIKE :eotiOrderNo>> <<AND EOTI_WORK_ORDER_NO LIKE :eotiWorkOrderNo>> <<AND EOTI_DOWNSTREAM_NO LIKE :eotiDownstreamNo>> <<AND EOTI_LOGISTIC_NO LIKE :eotiLogisticNo>> <<AND EOTI_EXPRESS_NO LIKE :eotiExpressNo>> <<AND EOTI_CARRIERS_CODE LIKE :eotiCarriersCode>> <<AND EOTI_CARRIERS_NAME LIKE :eotiCarriersName>> <<AND EOTI_TRACKING_TIME > :eotiTrackingTimeFrom>> <<AND EOTI_TRACKING_TIME <= :eotiTrackingTimeTo + 1>> <<AND EOTI_TRACKING_SITE LIKE :eotiTrackingSite>> <<AND EOTI_SIGN_PEOPLE LIKE :eotiSignPeople>> <<AND EOTI_STATUS LIKE :eotiStatus>> <<AND EOTI_STATUS_REMARK LIKE :eotiStatusRemark>> ${queryPlanDefinedSql} ${queryPlanSortSql}
